credit_line: Gift of Myra M. and William H. Mathers
dimensions: Frame H x W: 40.6 x 35.6 cm (16 x 14 in.)
title: Sampler
provenance:
Ex. coll. Fraser-Martin
Henry Say sale, cat. 342
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: embroidered on plain weave
description:
Embroidered in colored silks on a natural linen ground. A single alphabet at the top is followed by a verse: 
In the center, Adam and Eve are flanking a tree with serpent coiled around it. At the bottom, tulips frame the inscription. With a stylized floral vine border on four sides.
name: Sampler
